archimate:BusinessProcess.name: (L1)(proc) Part obsolescence
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process is seen in a procurement perspective. --- It should be connected to the ECR/ECP process on one side and to the tech data change process. --- LBO: Last buy order (TBC) --- 30 changes arrive per month and touch all programs. Most of them are touching several programs. All programs are touched, even the H175 and the H160. --- 1250 open cases (May 2 2018) Around 70% will generate a LBO => part exchange Around 20% will generate a redesign --- The system is diverging. --- The global transversal process view must be built in ordr not to solve this process problem only at the procurement level.
